backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining product, category, and order types with methods for config retrieval and product creation using in‑memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for key frontend files and components in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app assembling header, hero, categories, products, and footer, with backend config fetching and fallback categories.
frontend/src/components/CartSheet.tsx: Slide‑in cart panel showing cart items, quantity controls, and checkout panel toggle.
frontend/src/components/CategoryShowcase: Renders a grid of category cards with icons, gradients, and click-to-scroll behavior for navigating to products. Includes a brand story section and dynamic icon/gradient mapping.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutPanel.ts: Handles checkout form submission, order creation, and success display with cart clearing and error handling. Shows either the checkout form or an order confirmation view.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedCollecti: Displays three predefined featured collections with icons, gradients, and buttons. Provides a styled grid of promotional collection cards.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with brand info, category links that scroll to products, customer service links, and social icons. Uses provided brand name and categories for dynamic content.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Shows a large hero section with brand logo, headline, description, and CTAs that scroll to specific sections. Includes decorative background images and trust indicators.
frontend/src/components/NewsletterCTA.ts: Provides a newsletter signup form inside a styled card, capturing email input and resetting on submit. Includes decorative gradients and an icon header.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, pricing, stock indicators, style tags, and quick actions for viewing details or adding to cart.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailDia: Renders a dialog showing detailed product info, allowing selection of size, color, quantity, and adding the item to the cart with validation.
Shows products by category with style filtering, hash-based navigation, product detail modal handling, and quick-add cart functionality.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHeader: Provides a responsive storefront header with navigation, search/user icons, and cart access, updating category selection via URL hash.
Displays a grid of trust badges highlighting security, shipping, returns, and support benefits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when authentication changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider managing Internet Identity auth using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching storefront config, products, and placing orders, plus helpers for RegionStyle labels and options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables defining fonts, colors, and utility classes for the app's design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/state/cart.tsx: React context for cart state with add, remove, update quantity, clear actions, and computed item count and totals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app goals, features, constraints, and pending requirements for the e-commerce storefront.
